channel.title: New rs2 & rsc clan up and running
channel.description:
i finally got my clan back up and running and i already have over 200 members its mostly just a merchanting clan where everyone can buy anything for cheaper then a normal person could buy it.
it will eventually be a skill clan, pking clan, soul wars clan and more to come. register for my clan at [i][b]Vote4rsmods.t35.com [/b] [/i] i do have 3 mod positions open if you would like to try to get one of those spots with lots of benefits, just log into runescape off the merch clan link on the site and post on my thread and i will have a look at the reasons why you think you would be a good mod:)
